TopicTitle: A big thanks to the KSP Devs.

Articles.Content: I just wanted to thank the Devs for Kerbal Space Center. They work hard to update KSP, fix any bugs and help individual people fix their problems with anything and everything in the game. With all their hard work, they have succeeded in creating the absolute BEST build-it-and-fly-it simulator I have ever played. Thanks guys, and God bless!
